TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 控件的有关信息，该控件无需创建实例即可显示在 Web 部件控件目录中。

span.span: Provides information about a control that you can display in a catalog of Web Parts controls without having to create an instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件显示在用户可添加到页面的控件目录中时, 需要有关每个控件的一些基本信息。When controls are displayed in a catalog of controls that users can add to a page, some basic information about each control is required. 例如, 具有控件的标题和说明是非常有用的, 因此, 当用户查看目录时, 它们有足够的信息来决定是否向页面添加控件。For example, it is useful to have a title for the control, and a description, so that as users view a catalog they have enough information to decide whether to add a control to the page. 不过, 控件目录可能包含许多控件, 如果必须创建每个控件的实例以提取要在目录中显示的信息, 则它可能会影响应用程序的性能。However, a catalog of controls can potentially contain many controls, and it could affect the performance of an application if an instance of every control must be created to extract the information to display in the catalog. 类存在, 因此不需要创建控件的实例来检索控件目录中显示的控件的相关信息。 The class exists so that it is not necessary to create an instance of a control to retrieve the information about the control that is displayed in a catalog of controls. 在 Web 部件控件集中, 当页处于目录显示模式时, 还会将对象与各种控件结合使用。In the Web Parts control set, a object is also used in conjunction with the various controls when a page is in catalog display mode. 类具有其构造函数的两个重载, 一个在实例可用时将控件作为参数 (构造函数), 另一个采用包含有关控件的信息的多个字符串参数 ( 构造函数)。The class has two overloads of its constructor, one that takes a control as a parameter when an instance is available (the constructor), and one that takes several strings with information about the control as parameters (the constructor). 类还具有多个属性, 这些属性旨在包含控件的说明信息。The class also has several properties designed to contain the description information for controls. 下表汇总了属性以及每个属性在控件中对应的属性。The following table summarizes the properties, and what property each one corresponds to in a control. |Description 属性Description property|相关部件控件属性Related part control property| |--------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the class. 通常, 此类型主要由 Web 部件控件集使用, 但此代码示例只显示主说明属性的基本编程使用情况。Ordinarily, this type is used primarily by the Web Parts control set, but this code example is simply showing basic programmatic usage of the main description properties. 此代码示例包含四个部分:The code example has four parts: - 使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 承载其他控件的网页。A Web page to host the other controls. - 对代码示例的工作方式的说明。An explanation of how the code example works. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 有关用户控件的详细信息, 请参阅主题[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For more details about the user control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是自定义控件。The second part of the code example is a custom control. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译的方法。This code example uses the approach of dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近有两个`Register`指令: 一个注册用户控件, 另一个用于注册自定义控件, 该控件的源文件位于您站点的 App_Code 文件夹中。Near the top are two `Register` directives: one that registers the user control, and the other to register the custom control whose source file is located in the App_Code folder of your site. 页面``包含一个元素, 该元素又包含对两个控件的声明性引用: 名为`TextDisplayWebPart`的自定义控件以及将在运行时被视为控件的 Web 服务器控件。时间, 因为控件将使用对象将其包装。The page contains an `` element, which in turn contains declarative references to two controls: the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, and a Web server control that will be treated as a control at run time because the control will wrap it with a object. 请注意, `Button1_Click`在方法的代码中, 将使用 方法检索目录中控件的可用对象, 然后将说明详细信息全部写出到页面。Note that in the code for the `Button1_Click` method, the available objects for the controls in the catalog are retrieved using the method, and then the description details are all written out to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件并选择 "**目录**" 将页面更改为目录显示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to change the page to catalog display mode. 在目录中, 应会看到可添加到页面中的两个控件。In the catalog, you should see the two controls that are available to be added to the page. 单击 "**列出 WebPartDescription 信息**" 按钮, 代码会将所有可用对象的值写出到页面。Click the **List WebPartDescription Information** button, and the code writes out the values of all available objects to the page. 这说明你可以检索目录中控件的说明详细信息, 而无需创建控件本身的实例。This demonstrates that you can retrieve description details for controls in a catalog without having to create instances of the controls themselves.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化包含特定 控件有关信息的类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的重载每个都返回类的新实例, 该实例包含特定控件的相关信息。The overloads for the constructor each return a new instance of the class, which contains information about a specific control. 重载之间的区别在于创建新实例的方案。The difference between the overloads is the scenario in which the new instance is created. 在某些情况下, 当应用程序具有控件的可用实例时, 将使用构造函数。In some cases, when the application has an available instance of a control, the constructor is used. 当应用程序没有控件实例时, 如果通过控件导入控件说明文件 , 则使用构造函数。When the application does not have a control instance, as is the case when a control description file is being imported through the control, the constructor is used.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart part) cil managed

span.span: A control whose information is contained in a .

summary.span: 如果 控件实例可用，则初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a control instance is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于基于现有控件创建新的对象。 The constructor is used for creating a new object based on an existing control. 此构造函数只调用另一个重载, 即构造函数, 从`part`参数的属性中获取所需的参数值。This constructor simply calls the other overload, the constructor, obtaining the required parameter values from properties on the `part` parameter.

exception.span: 的 属性为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The property of is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartDescription (string id, string title, string description, string imageUrl);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string id, string title, string description, string imageUrl) cil managed
Public Sub New (id As String, title As String, description As String, imageUrl As String)

summary.span: 使用几个包含 控件说明信息的字符串初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using several strings that contain description information for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件不可用时, 构造函数用于创建类的新实例。The constructor is used to create a new instance of the class when a control is not available. 例如, 在控件为控件导入说明文件时, 会发生这种情况。For example, this occurs in the case of an control when it imports a description file for a control. 它获取直接从说明文件创建对象所需的信息, 并且不存在实例。It gets the information it needs to create a object directly from the description file, and a instance is not present.

exception.span: 或 为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: or is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CatalogIconImageUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ CatalogIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个 URL，该 URL 包含用作 控件图标的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets a URL containing the path to an image used as an icon for a control.

value.span: 包含 URL 的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains a URL; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接与属性相对应。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果对控件设置了该属性, 则相应对象中的属性也将具有值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 仅当页处于目录显示模式并且控件在控件目录中显示时, 此属性才适用。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果在属性值中为控件分配了图标, 则该图标将出现在目录旁边的控件中。If the control has an icon assigned to it in the property value, the icon appears in the catalog next to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 有关运行此代码示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 网页的`Button1_Click`方法中的以下代码演示了如何使用方法获取目录中的对象集合, 然后通过循环显示目录中每个控件的详细信息通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意, 将在以下代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 控件的说明文本。

span.span: Gets the text of a description for a control.

value.span: 包含 控件说明的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains the description for a control; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接与属性相对应。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果对控件设置了该属性, 则相应对象中的属性也将具有值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 仅当页处于目录显示模式并且控件在控件目录中显示时, 此属性才适用。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果为控件指定了说明, 则说明将在目录中显示为控件上的工具提示。If the control has a description assigned to it, the description appears in the catalog as a ToolTip on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 有关运行此代码示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 网页的`Button1_Click`方法中的以下代码演示了如何使用方法获取目录中的对象集合, 然后通过循环显示目录中每个控件的详细信息通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意, 将在以下代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of a corresponding control.

value.span: 包含控件 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值不能为`null`; 它必须始终具有值。The value of the property cannot be `null`; it must always have a value. 属性直接与属性相对应。The property corresponds directly to the property. 仅当页处于目录显示模式并且控件在控件目录中显示时, 此属性才适用。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 有关运行此代码示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 网页的`Button1_Click`方法中的以下代码演示了如何使用方法获取目录中的对象集合, 然后通过循环显示目录中每个控件的详细信息通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意, 将在以下代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Title As String
public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的标题文本。

span.span: Gets the title text of a corresponding control.

value.span: 字符串，包含相应控件的标题。

span.span: A string that contains the title of the corresponding control.

value.span: 默认值是一个计算出的字符串，由 .NET Framework 提供。

span.span: The default value is a calculated string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值直接对应于属性。The value of the property corresponds directly to the property. 如果相应的控件具有其属性的任何值, 则将成为属性的值; 否则, 该标题为计算值。Whatever the corresponding control has for its property, that becomes the value of the property; otherwise, the title is a calculated value. 仅当页处于目录显示模式并且控件在控件目录中显示时, 此属性才适用。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 分配给控件的任何标题将显示在目录中该控件的旁边。Whatever title is assigned to a control appears next to the control in the catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 有关运行此代码示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 网页的`Button1_Click`方法中的以下代码演示了如何使用方法获取目录中的对象集合, 然后通过循环显示目录中每个控件的详细信息通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意, 将在以下代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]
